metadata.title: AI FileSense - AI-Powered File Organization for Windows
metadata.description: Organize years of files in minutes, not hours. AI reads your documents and sorts them into clean folders—no configuration required.

footer.tagline: AI-powered file organization for Windows. Your files stay on your computer—only small text snippets are sent to AI for smart classification.

hero.title: Organize
hero.subtitle: AI FileSense reads your documents and intelligently categorizes them into a clean 12-folder structure. Preview everything. Undo anything. Lose nothing.

solution.title: How It Works
solution.subtitle: From chaos to organized in three steps
solution.step1Desc: Point to Desktop, Documents, or Downloads. AI FileSense finds PDFs, Word docs, PowerPoint, and text files.
solution.step2Desc: Claude AI reads file contents to understand what each document is—not just filenames. A file named doc_2024_final.pdf could be a tax form, medical record, or work contract—AI FileSense knows the difference.
solution.step3Desc: Preview where every file will go. Change any suggestion. Then apply—files move to Documents/Organized Files/ with full undo capability.

features.title: Built for Trust, Designed for Everyone
features.subtitle: Powerful AI that anyone can use
features.aiClassificationDesc: Uses Claude AI to categorize files by actual content analysis. A file named doc_2024_final.pdf could be a tax form, medical record, or work contract—AI FileSense knows the difference.
features.smartFoldersDesc: Organized numbered folders (01 Work, 02 Money, 03 Home, etc.) that sort consistently across file systems.
features.oneClickDesc: Choose from Lightly Organized, More Organized, or Fully Organized folder structures.
features.safeReversibleDesc: Preview every change before it happens, with one-click undo. Changed your mind? Restore everything instantly.
features.privacyFirstDesc: All file scanning happens locally; only small text snippets sent to AI for classification. No account required.
features.fullyBilingualDesc: Complete English and Spanish (Mexico) support throughout the entire app.

folders.title: The 12-Folder System
folders.subtitle: Pre-designed categories for personal and professional documents
folders.workDesc: Resumes, job offers, performance reviews, payslips
folders.personalDesc: Bank statements, taxes, investments, receipts, invoices
folders.medicalDesc: Medical records, prescriptions, lab results, insurance
folders.creativeDesc: Family correspondence, kids' records, personal letters
folders.archiveDesc: Old docs (3+ years), completed projects, historical records
folders.getStartedDesc: Download free and transform your cluttered folders into organized bliss in minutes.

cta.title: Ready to Get Organized?
cta.subtitle: Download AI FileSense and organize your files in minutes. No account needed, no configuration required.

hero.title: AI That Reads Your Documents So You Don't Have To
hero.subtitle: Smart organization that runs entirely on your computer

chooseFolders.title: 1. Choose Folders
chooseFolders.description: Select Desktop, Documents, Downloads, or add custom folders. Pick which file types to organize (PDF, Word, Text, PowerPoint).

scan.title: 2. Scan
scan.description: AI analyzes file content (locally extracted, snippets sent to AI). Progress bar with reassuring status messages.

preview.title: 3. Preview
preview.description: See how files will be organized across categories. Review results, exclude files, answer AI clarifying questions. Choose organization depth.

organize.title: 4. Organize
organize.description: Files move to Documents/Organized Files/. Real-time progress with file counts. Every move logged for undo capability.

done.title: 5. Done
done.description: Summary of what was organized. Quick access to view organized folders. One-click undo available. Continue to Dashboard for ongoing management.

folders.title: The 12-Folder System
folders.subtitle: Pre-designed categories that work for 95% of files

work.name: 01 Work
work.desc: Resumes, job offers, performance reviews, payslips

personal.name: 02 Money
personal.desc: Bank statements, taxes, investments, receipts, invoices

medical.name: 04 Health
medical.desc: Medical records, prescriptions, lab results, insurance

creative.name: 07 Family
creative.desc: Family correspondence, kids' records, personal letters

archive.name: 11 Archive
archive.desc: Old docs (3+ years), completed projects, historical records

differentiators.title: What Makes AI FileSense Different
differentiators.subtitle: Built for people who've tried and failed to organize manually

contentBased.title: Content-Based Intelligence
contentBased.description: Unlike simple file sorters that only look at extensions or dates, AI FileSense reads the actual content of your documents. A file named doc_2024_final.pdf could be a tax form, medical record, or work contract—AI FileSense knows the difference.

trulyBilingual.title: Truly Bilingual
trulyBilingual.description: Not just translated UI—the entire experience is designed for both English and Spanish (Mexico) speakers. AI understands documents in both languages. Category names work in both cultures. Instant language switching.

humanInTheLoop.title: Human-in-the-Loop Design
humanInTheLoop.description: AI suggests, you decide. Preview every change before it happens. Exclude files you don't want moved. Answer clarifying questions for ambiguous files. Full undo at any time.

privacyFirst.title: Privacy-Respecting Architecture
privacyFirst.description: Files never leave your computer. Only small text snippets (first page/100 lines) sent to AI. All scanning and indexing happens locally. SQLite database stays on your machine.

smartFolders.title: Smart Folder Structure
smartFolders.description: The numbered 12-folder system (01-12) ensures consistent sort order on any file system, clear life-area categories, subfolders for detailed organization when wanted, and a Review folder for uncertain items.

crashRecovery.title: Crash Recovery & Safety
crashRecovery.description: Transaction logging for all file moves. Incomplete session detection and recovery. Test mode to preview without actual moves. Every operation is reversible.

personalized.title: Personalized to How You Work
personalized.description: Different folder depths based on preference. Organization style adapts to your roles. Timeline vs. topic vs. project-based options. Remembers your choices for future sessions.

fileTypes.title: Supported File Types
fileTypes.subtitle: AI FileSense extracts content from these document formats

roadmap.title: Product Roadmap
roadmap.subtitle: Where we are and where we're going

phase1.title: Phase 1
phase1.description: Core features: AI classification, 12-folder system, preview & undo, bilingual support, crash recovery, zero configuration.

phase2.title: Phase 2
phase2.description: Excel/CSV spreadsheet support, image file classification, automatic new file organization (file watcher), custom category rules, scheduled organization.

phase3.title: Phase 3
phase3.description: macOS support, Linux support, cloud sync options, team/family sharing.

technical.title: System Requirements
technical.subtitle: What you need to run AI FileSense
technical.note: Internet connection required for AI classification

hero.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
hero.subtitle: Free to use, no subscription required

freeForNow.title: Free During Launch
freeForNow.subtitle: No payment required
freeForNow.description: AI FileSense is completely free to use during our launch period. No subscription fees, no hidden costs. Just download and organize.

faq.title: Pricing FAQ
faq.a1: Yes. During our launch period, AI FileSense is completely free to use with no limitations. No credit card required.
faq.q2: Will there be a paid version later?
faq.a2: We may introduce premium features in the future, but core functionality will always have a free tier.
faq.q3: Do I need to create an account?
faq.a3: No. AI FileSense works without any account or sign-up. Just download and run.
faq.a4: No limits on files or folders during the free launch period. Organize as much as you want.
faq.a5: Not yet, but it's on our roadmap. Contact us if you're interested in team features.
faq.a6: It's free right now! When we introduce paid features, we'll offer discounts for students, educators, and nonprofits.

activityLog.title: Activity Log & Undo
activityLog.description: Every file move is tracked. Undo a single file, an entire session, or roll back everything. Even if the app crashes, you can recover.

features.fullRollback: Roll back to any previous state

tips.title: Tips for Best Results
tips.tip1Desc: Your Downloads folder is usually the messiest. Start there and see results immediately.
tips.tip2Desc: Always review the plan before applying. You can change any suggestion.
tips.tip3Desc: The Activity Log tracks everything. You can always go back.
tips.tip4Desc: AI FileSense only processes new files on repeat runs. Keep things organized automatically.

hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about AI FileSense.

questions.q1: Is my data safe? Do my files get uploaded anywhere?
questions.a1: Your files never leave your computer. AI FileSense only sends small text snippets (first page of PDFs, first 100 lines of text files) to the AI for classification. The AI never sees your full documents, and no files are uploaded to any server.
questions.q2: What happens if I don't like how files were organized?
questions.a2: Full undo is always available. Click "Undo organization" on the Success screen or Dashboard, and all files return to their original locations instantly. Every file move is logged, so nothing is ever lost.
questions.q3: Why are some files put in the 'Review' folder?
questions.a3: The Review folder (12 Review) contains files where the AI wasn't confident about the correct category. This is intentional—rather than guess wrong, AI FileSense lets you decide. You can manually move these files or re-run organization after adding more context.
questions.q4: Can I exclude certain files from being organized?
questions.a4: Yes! In Step 3 (Preview), you can uncheck specific files to exclude them, exclude entire folders/categories, or enable Test mode to preview without moving anything.
questions.q5: Does AI FileSense work with languages other than English?
questions.a5: Yes! AI FileSense is fully bilingual (English and Spanish/Mexico). The AI can also classify documents written in Spanish. Switch languages anytime using the language toggle in the header.
questions.a6: Phase 1 supports PDF documents (.pdf), Microsoft Word (.doc, .docx), PowerPoint presentations (.pptx), and text files (.txt, .md, .log, .csv). Coming soon: Excel spreadsheets (.xlsx), images, and more.
questions.q7: Where do my organized files go?
questions.a7: All files are moved to Documents/Organized Files/ with numbered subfolders (01 Work, 02 Money, etc.). The numbered prefixes ensure folders always appear in the same order regardless of your file explorer settings.
questions.q8: Can I run AI FileSense again after organizing?
questions.a8: Absolutely! Click the AI FileSense logo or use "Organize Again" on the Dashboard. The app automatically skips files already in the Organized Files folder, so it only processes new files.
questions.q9: What if the AI categorizes a file incorrectly?
questions.a9: You have multiple opportunities to correct this: In Step 3 (Preview), the AI asks clarifying questions about ambiguous files and you can exclude files from organization. After organization, move files manually or use Undo. The AI learns from the clarification questions you answer, improving accuracy for similar files.
questions.a10: Yes, for AI classification. The file scanning happens locally, but classifying files requires sending snippets to the Claude AI service. Without internet, you can't run a new scan, but you can still access previously organized files.
questions.q11: Do I need to set up an API key or create an account?
questions.a11: No. AI FileSense works out of the box with no configuration required. No API keys, no accounts, no sign-up. Just download and run.

hero.title: About AI FileSense
hero.subtitle: Local-first file organization powered by AI

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We built AI FileSense because organizing files shouldn't mean uploading your personal documents to someone else's server. Your medical records, tax documents, and personal files deserve better than cloud storage and vague privacy policies.

commitment.title: Our Privacy Commitment
commitment.intro: We don't just talk about privacy—we built it into the architecture:

items.local: 100% local processing: Your files never leave your computer
items.minimal: Minimal data to AI: Only small text snippets for classification
items.noAccount: No account required: No signup, no email, no tracking
items.noTelemetry: Zero telemetry: We don't collect analytics or usage data
items.noConfig: No configuration: Works out of the box, no API keys needed
items.encrypted: Transaction logging: Every move tracked for easy undo

values.title: What We Believe
values.privacyDesc: Your files stay on your computer. We never see your data—not filenames, not contents, not metadata. We built it this way on purpose.
values.simplicityDesc: Powerful AI shouldn't mean complex software. Download, install, run—no technical skills required.
values.transparencyDesc: Preview everything before it moves. Undo anything after it moves. You're always in the driver's seat.
